document.text:
From: 
To: 
Cc: 
• I. 
Subject: Expert Testimony 
Date: Thu, 29 Oct 2020 19:47:55 +0000 
Dr. Hughes, 
Together with colleague I'm one of the federal prosecutors handling the case of 
United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, which is scheduled to go to trial on July 12, 2021 in the Southern District of New York. 
We would be interested in speaking with you about your availability to testify as an expert witness at trial. Are you 
available for a call tomorrow or next week to discuss? 
Thanks very much, 
EFTA00018259
